wattwatt.connectors.devices.uncontrollable.hairdryer

Class HairDryerConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • wattwatt.connectors.devices.DeviceConnector
        • wattwatt.connectors.devices.uncontrollable.hairdryer.HairDryerConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI, java.rmi.Remote, IDevices, IHairDryer

    public class HairDryerConnector
extends DeviceConnector
implements IHairDryer
    The class HairDryerConnector implements a connector between the IController and the IHairDryer interfaces.

    Description

    It implements the required interface IController and in the methods it calls the corresponding offered method IHairDryer.

    Created on : 2020-01-27

    Author:

    Bah Thierno, Zheng Pascal
